item.title: BashOnWindows常见问题汇总
item.description: 无法启动SSH服务，由于Win自带服务冲突 https://github.com/Microsoft/BashOnWindows/issues/734 System => Services => disable: "SSH server proxy" "SSH server broker" 启动ssh后拒绝访问，refuse或connection closed https://github.com/Microsoft/BashOnWindows/issues/300 Actually changing UsePrivilegeSeparation to no in /etc/ssh/sshd_config
